column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Again , critics are n't ( I hope ) persecuting anyone .
#Text=It 's to inform .
#Text=I 've seen in several of the Anonymous protest videos where Anons say they 're not there to ridicule the beliefs but to complain about their actions .
#Text=That 's a correct stance .

#Text=It is claimed by some anti-Church of Scientology campaigns that some Scientology doctrine is flawed or inconsistent , could not the same be said of the arguments put forward by those campaigns .
#Text=( or indeed the ideological doctrines of any number of other religions ) ?
#Text=I 'm a Christian .
#Text=I actually like reading about the inconsistencies of my religion , so I can understand it better .
#Text=If any organization promotes some belief or teaching , then it 's fine to point out inconsistencies .
#Text=In fact , it 's good .
#Text=I just happen to know a lot about Scientology , so that 's what I deal with .
#Text=The German Government continues to pursue it 's investigation into Church of Scientology , why should law enforcement waste time on such investigations ?
#Text=Obviously , they do n't think they 're wasting their time .
#Text=If there is evidence of illegality , it should be pursued .
#Text=Remember Operation Snow White , for example .
#Text=Scientology railed against the FBI as being anti-religion and bigoted when the raids happened .
#Text=Yet the FBI turned out to be right .
#Text=One aspect of Scientology , is a rejection of modern psychiatry , would you not agree that even the best of shrinks can still get things badly wrong ?
#Text=( even when implementing so called ethical practices ) ?
#Text=Psychiatry definitely has problems .
#Text=And if people think that 's something that should be researched , great .
#Text=But I deal with Scientology .
#Text=They reject psychiatry so much that they made a video of themselves blowing up psychiatry with a grenade .
#Text=Their goal is to eradicate psychiatry .
#Text=As a whole group , not just get rid of the bad practices .
#Text=That 's wrong .
#Text=When an organization faces an ideological challenge from specific individuals , is it not reasonable to have sufficient information to mount a robust defense ?
#Text=Is this referring to Scientology defending itself I guess ?
#Text=Hopefully , the information being used in defense is correct information .
#Text=And sure , I 've been on radio with a Scientologist before .
#Text=I enjoy it when they debate .
#Text=But that 's very seldom , unfortunately .
#Text=If you could set up a debate I 'd love it
#Text=How does campaigning against Church of Scientology materially differ from ' hate crimes ' as defined by many laws ?
#Text=Critics of Scientology are more like whistleblowers or muckraking journalists .
#Text=We 're not doing it out of hate .
#Text=We 're doing it out of concern for the truth .
#Text=People get hurt so we try to prevent it .
#Text=Ted Kennedy eulogized his brother Robert saying " he saw a wrong , and tried to right it .
